Description.UIName: Permanent Contract for Mechbuster 'Mary' Aerospace Fighter
Description.Name: Permanent Contract for Mechbuster 'Mary' Aerospace Fighter
Description.Details: Thanks to the ASF's common status, this is a permanent contract offer for use of a Mechbuster 'Mary' Aerospace Fighter during Strafing Runs. Purchasing this contract will permit the use of the Mechbuster 'Mary' Aerospace Fighter when making use of the Strafing Run Comm Suite. This contract is permanent and does not expire. Hold Shift when selecting the strafe ability to select a specific unit from among those available! COMMUNITY CONTENT
